    • queryHandler

      public String queryHandler​(String query)
      handle queries from client's and provides special response for some query types. query types: [register, login, save, load]
      Parameters:
      query - string of client`s query
      Returns:
      query, if query type is not in list above Register.registerPerson return, if query type is 'register'; Login.loginPerson return, if query type is 'login'; Message return, if query type is 'save'; Message object save function return: "Forbidden option, you must log in first", if person that did not log in, try to use save option "Message was saved", if all is ok "FileNotFound", if file to save message was not found "Message was not saved, something went wrong", if something went wrong during message saving Message object load function return, if query type is 'load'

    • run

      public void run()
      main function for MonoThreadClientHandler class with main conditionally endless cycle, in which you can interact with program and program(MonoThreadClientHandler) can interact with client(Client) function runs, when server create new Thread for MonoThreadClientHandler object, after client get successfully connected to server(MultiThreadServer)
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
